import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import SingleDBJob from './SingleData' import "./SingleJob.css" import { baseUrl } from '../Variables' function SingleJob() { let { id } = useParams() const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(()=>{ if(parseInt(id) !== parseInt(SingleDBJob.id)) return navigate("/"); },) return (
) } function BringSingleJob({data}){ // const data = wholeData.SingleDBJob; // const dataAnalyis = wholeData.SingleDBJobAnalyis // console.log(data.SingleDBJob.id ) // const [ specificData,setSpecificData] = useState(data) return(<>   See All Jobs

) } export default SingleJob
